Hi,

I have dynamically created a DataGridCheckBoxColumn from code behind in C#. How do I capture the events being fired when a checkbox within this column is checked?
You'll have to set the events through the DataGridCheckBoxColumn.ElementStyle or DataGridCheckBoxColumn.EditingElementStyle (using EventSetters).
Can you give an example please? (C#)
This thread, http://www.codeplex.com/wpf/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=45372, shows an example of settting ElementStyle and EditingElementStyle with a DataGridComboBoxColumn.

Is it possible that you have an example or know of any previous posts in C# please as this is where my DataGRidCheckBoxColumn is added to the dataGrid. I have no XAML markup whatsoever for this column so trying to implement the example in the link above is impossible.

Thanks in advance.
